hooks.command: bash -c 'CMD=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin).get(\"command\",\"\"))" 2>/dev/null); for BLOCKED in "rm -rf" "curl " "wget " "git push" "pip install --force" "pip install --upgrade"; do if echo "$CMD" | grep -q "$BLOCKED"; then echo "BLOCKED: $BLOCKED is not allowed" >&2; exit 2; fi; done; exit 0'

bash -c 'FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | python3 -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print(d.get(\"file_path\",d.get(\"path\",\"\")))" 2>/dev/null); for PROTECTED in "CITATION.cff" "anti_salami_checklist.json" "LICENSE" "examples/"; do if echo "$FILE" | grep -q "$PROTECTED"; then echo "BLOCKED: $FILE is read-only (protected: $PROTECTED)" >&2; exit 2; fi; done; exit 0'
